text: Joseph Khalil Aoun (born 10 January 1964) is a Lebanese general and politician who has been the 14th president of Lebanon since 9 January 2025. In 2017, he became the 14th Commander of the Lebanese Armed Forces. == Early life == He was born on January 10, 1964 in the town of Sin El Fil. He completed his secondary studies at the Fr√®re-Mont-Lasalle School and obtained a degree in political sciences. == Military career == His military life, he volunteered in 1983, and since 1984 he has participated in several roles such as officers in 1986, the diving course in 1987, and the military officer course in 1996, in addition to the battalion commander course in 2002, and a staff course in 2012. == References == == Related pages == Category:Living people Category:1964 births Category:Presidents of Lebanon Category:Current national leaders Category:Lebanese military people
title: Joseph Aoun
